I-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_0
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_1
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:OverallWidth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:OverallDepth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:WebThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_2
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:FlangeThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_3
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_0
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:FlangeEdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_1
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:FlangeSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_1
}
```
